definition: Qinling mountain range in Shaanxi forming natural barrier between Guanzhong plain 關中平原|关中平原[Guan1 zhong1 ping2 yuan2] and Han River 漢水|汉水[Han4 shui3] valley
surname Qin/Qin dynasty (221-207 BC) of the first emperor 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2]/abbr. for 陝西|陕西[Shan3 xi1]
mountain range/mountain ridge
Qinling mountain range in Shaanxi forming natural barrier between Guanzhong plain 關中平原|关中平原 and Han River 汉水 valley
the Qinling plank road to Shu, a historical mountain road from Shaanxi to Sichuan

sentences.english: So Wedging was the mechanism for mountain building in the Qinling orogen.
sentences.chinese: 楔入構造活動是秦嶺造山帶的成山模型。

sentences.english: Circadian activity and antipredation behaviour of Agkistrodon qinlingensis are observed.
sentences.chinese: 本文觀察研究了秦嶺蝮蛇的活動節律和反捕行爲。

sentences.english: Habit and behavior of salt licking of golden takins was observed from June to August, 1997.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道了秦嶺羚牛的舔鹽行爲和習性。

sentences.english: The south Qinling has formed an imbricated thrust fault at low angle from the north to the south.
sentences.chinese: 南秦嶺自北向南產生低角度疊瓦狀逆沖斷裂。

sentences.english: The north area of Weihe River is located in the joint of the Qilian-North Qinling orogenic belt.
sentences.chinese: 天水渭北地區地處祁連與北秦嶺造山帶結合部位。

sentences.english: Gold deposits of the western Qinling belt comprising Carlin type and orogenic type gold deposits.
sentences.chinese: 西秦嶺金礦牀分爲卡林型和造山型兩類。

sentences.english: In practice, the rejuvenation of A. chenesiensis should follow the principle of favored tree species for suitable sites and optimal provenances be used.
sentences.chinese: 生產上秦嶺冷杉的復壯一定要遵循適地適樹的原則。

sentences.english: They were both formed during the closing process of the Qinling paleooceanic basin in Jinning period.
sentences.chinese: 它們均爲晉寧期古秦嶺洋盆閉合過程的產物。

sentences.english: Relatively, the factors of summer habitat selection in south slope are more than North slope.
sentences.chinese: 相比而言，秦嶺南坡夏季棲居地選擇因素多於北坡。

sentences.english: Soft rock area distribute extensive at south area of Mountain Qin. Which Xikang railway go through.
sentences.chinese: 西康鐵路沿線軟質巖帶在秦嶺以南分佈較廣。

sentences.english: They live in the Qinling Mountains of China.
sentences.chinese: 中國秦嶺山脈是它們的家。

sentences.english: The Laerma gold deposit is the hydrothermal type deposit in trigonometric area of gold deposit of the Western Qinling Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 拉爾瑪金礦牀是秦嶺“金三角”中典型的熱水礦牀。

sentences.english: Weibei area is located in the joint of the Qilian and North Qinling orogenic belts.
sentences.chinese: 天水渭北地區地處祁連與北秦嶺造山帶結合部位。

sentences.english: Systematic introduction and summarization are made for the construction of extra-long Qinling Tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 對秦嶺特長隧道的建設作了系統介紹和總結。

sentences.english: The ecological and economic benefits from using the solar stove and the methane are remarkable in the west Qinling mountain area.
sentences.chinese: 在西秦嶺山地使用太陽竈和沼氣，生態經濟效益顯著。
